ing: 1 large avocado, peeled, pitted and cubed
des: "This dip is perfect with tortilla chips or as a spread for a sandwich. Hot sauce can be omitted or lessened if you want it milder."
ins: Place the edamame, onion, cilantro, and olive oil into a food processor. Pulse until finely chopped. Add the avocado, lemon juice, and chile-garlic sauce; season to taste with salt and pepper. Puree until smooth. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes before serving.
